cells.source:
from biokbase.Transform.Client import Transform
transform_client = Transform('https://ci.kbase.us/services/transform')

from biokbase.userandjobstate.client import UserAndJobState
ujs_client = UserAndJobState('https://ci.kbase.us/services/userandjobstate')

import os
ws_id = os.environ['KB_WORKSPACE_ID']

upload_jobs = []
for i in range(len(genome_list)):
    transform_args = set_genome_fetch_args(genome_list[i], url_list[i], ws_id)
    upload_jobs.append(transform_client.upload(transform_args))

outputs.name: stdout
outputs.text: Job 5569ed87e4b095f8092a40aa is complete with message Upload to wjriehl:1433005498810 completed

kbstate.title: Compare Two Proteomes

info.name: Compare Two Proteomes
info.tooltip: Perform a comparison of two proteomes, producing a dot plot matrix and a table of gene differences.
info.subtitle: Perform a comparison of two proteomes, producing a dot plot matrix and a table of gene differences.

parameters.description: Source genome 1
parameters.short_hint: Source genome 1

parameters.description: Source genome 2
parameters.short_hint: Source genome 2

parameters.description: Output proteome comparison; if empty, a name will be chosen randomly
parameters.short_hint: Output proteome comparison; if empty, a name will be chosen randomly

parameters.description: Maximum e-value threshold
parameters.short_hint: Maximum e-value threshold

parameters.description: Minimum threshold for percent ratio between hit bit-score and bit-score of related best bi-directional hit
parameters.short_hint: Minimum threshold for percent ratio between hit bit-score and bit-score of related best bi-directional hit

kbstate.title: Build a FeatureSet from a Genome

info.name: Build a FeatureSet from a Genome
info.tooltip: Create a new feature set by selecting features from a genome
info.subtitle: Create a new feature set by selecting features from a genome

parameters.short_hint: The Genome to select the features from
The comma or line separated ids of the features to include
If provided, the new features will be combined with this FeatureSet

parameters.description: Generted clusters
parameters.short_hint: Name for the new FeatureSet object
Description for FeatureSet object

method.replacement_text: Created a new FeatureSet with features from {{{input_genome}}}

info.subtitle: Annotate or re-annotate bacterial or archaeal genome using RASTtk.

parameters.description: A genome (set of DNA contigs) including structural and functional annotations
